strapiPost.title: Namida Lab Recognized At 2023 Edison Awards
strapiPost.content:
Namida Lab, headquartered in Fayetteville, was awarded the prestigious Gold prize for Intelligent Diagnostics at the recent 2023 Edison Awards for their innovative biological breast cancer screening technology, Auria.

  • Good tears: A groundbreaking at-home biological breast cancer screening test powered by tears, Auria has garnered national attention and put Arkansas on the map for this cutting-edge contribution to women's health.
  • Prestige: The Edison Awards honor the best in product and service development, marketing, design, and innovation, previously recognizing the likes of Steve Jobs, Elon Musk, General Motors, and Genentech.

Learn more about the work of Namida Lab and its innovative product Auria HERE.
